title: Advanced Learning Experience Design (LXD) Course Utilizing a Socio-Technical Educational Systems Approach in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Learning Design Theories and Project Management Experience
context.additional_context: Offering a collaborative environment using digital devices for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three learning experience design frameworks that consider sociocultural contexts
Learners can analyze the interaction of technology, environment, and pedagogy to design project-based learning at least twice
Learners can develop at least one assessment rubric reflecting learner characteristics and cultural sensitivity
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
